data.text: @ctvwinnipeg Lmao they won't get it. It's all BS, should never fine people for being human. Standing up for your basic human rights and fighting the power.
@sellen_ds @ctvwinnipeg I’ll wait for actual info with the technical details.  Big difference between a quashed procedural issue (which happen all the time) vs the orders are invalid

@sellen_ds @ctvwinnipeg Some tickets are always thrown out by courts for procedural issues or mistakes.  I haven’t heard anywhere that they are being tossed explicitly because that the orders are illegal.
@brndpete @ctvwinnipeg The tickets are being thrown out in court. What exactly is it that you're having difficulty understanding?
